execution_plan.description: Count products per order by joining Orders with Order_Items and grouping by order_id and order_status_code (returns only orders that have items).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Orders.order_id AS s1__order_id, Orders.order_status_code AS s1__order_status_code, COUNT(Order_Items.product_id) AS s1__product_count FROM Orders JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_status_code;
